abstract: Melissa Clark A Good Appetite column shares recipe for fried eggplant with chickpeas and mint chutney.
lead_paragraph: Frying is a little more work and mess, sure, but the crispy outside and custardy inside make for a worthwhile delicacy. (Article plus video.)

headline.main: The Great Eggplant Question: To Fry or Not to Fry?
headline.print_headline: Eggplant, Broiled or Fried (but Especially Fried)

snippet: Frying is a little more work and mess, sure, but the crispy outside and custardy inside make for a worthwhile delicacy. (Article plus video.)
